verbs.description: at - attention [V: grilled] [ARG1: chicken] after years of making this recipe i have yet to find a better grilled chicken the cooking technique makes it so juicy and tender you wo n’t want to fix a whole chicken any other way —shirley hodge bangor pennsylvania chicken
